TextBlock.Text: ESCALL: It seems like we had an unsuccessful docking. Is everyone okay?
DIN: Yes, I'm fine. Where are we?
SECCA: I bumped my head a little, but overall, I'll survive. Escall... are you wounded?!
ESCALL: I'm afraid so. I got a piece of glass in my chest during the rough landing.
DIN: Oh no! We need to assess the surroundings and call for help quickly!
SECCA: Din, go search for help. I'll catch up with you soon. I'll set up a distress signal transmitter. Escall, hang in there!
ESCALL: It seems like I'm losing some blood. The important thing is not to remove the shard...
